Reviews.Title: Didn't think I would like it.
Reviews.Author: John Vance
Reviews.Content: My first impresion of the iPad 1 was "it's stupid, don't need it".  About 2 weeks ago I had a heart attack and my Dr. Told me that I need to have a 1000 cal diet and work out a lot more.  Well I couldn't use my phone for the calory counting, too small.  Well I decided to buy iPad 2 and I was angry, but I knew I needed one for ONE reason is to count calories.  I've had it for about a week now, and I LOVE IT.  I really can't leave with ought it anymore. iPad 2 really is saving my life, with the apps to count my cal, my workout programs, and even my Dr. Can see what I eat and what I do at the gym.  I'm not going to talk about how cool it is to serf the web, and do business on it...  I have a 16 g white iPad.  If you are trying to decide if you want it or not, and you have the money for one,  GET IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Cameras are terrible
Reviews.Author: Johnny Dee
Reviews.Content: Great unit, but be aware, the cameras, even the better, forward-facing one--really bite. Why they couldn't use the camera from the current iPhone, which is quite good, on this $500+ product, is beyond me. It is a huge flaw in an otherwise mostly outstanding beast.  On a more minor note, the Apple tendency to design for profit instead of ease of use is always maddening. Case in point:  The built in memory costs $100 for each additional 16GBs.  My (non-iPhone) phone has a removable mini SD card that cost $9 for 16 GB, and I can add memory at will, for very little money. This could easily have been the Apple approach with the iPhone & iPad. A mini SD is the size of a fingernail. So I still buy Apple products because they are so good in so many ways, but the affordability thing is kind of ridiculous. Their computers are better than PCs, no question, but should not cost fully twice to three times what a comparable PC costs.

Reviews.Title: No Java!
Reviews.Author: amikeliunas
Reviews.Content: Most people are aware that iPads don't run Flash based content.IPad has its own YouTube browser to compensate for this design flaw.However, no one mentions that you can't run Java on an iPad or iPhone!!!There are still thousand of web sites and corporate applications running Java.Java is still #1 or #2 language in the world for developing applications.Because Apple had an internal war with Adobe and Sun, the consumers suffer and received a product that has a limited feature set.Check with this url [...]Steve Jobs has been quoted as saying "Java's not worth building in. Nobody uses Java anymore. It's this big heavyweight ball and chain."What is interesting to know is that Android phones and tables are running mostly Java applications... so Java is really not dead, but Apple is pretending to ignore the competition like they did in the 90's and think that Microsoft Windows was only a passing fad...

Reviews.Title: I got sucked in...oh well..it does some things well
Reviews.Author: M. C. Stith "frozintime"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for travel and business. The lightness and portability is cool, and it seems rather seamless until I went to use on my work websites...then oh no, they wouldnt work. Well, I went looking for apps....and guess what, there arent any for those websites. UGH! No updates, apps, or workarounds. Im stuck using it for emails and some websites, and a few apps. My mistake as I should have known they used Flash. Im just glad I didnt buy a 3G model or I really would have tossed more cash in the fire. I should have done better research, but figured there would be some sort of workaround, but there is not as of now. I would have been much better off with another of the competitors that used flash.Also there is very limited expandability. This is more of a gadget and not a computer or even a netbook. At least I can get on websites and use it with a netbook.It will allow me to stay connected through emails and some do some slow surfing, but thats really the extent of it.This is a very sad disappointment for business use....

Reviews.Title: Incorrect item
Reviews.Author: Techie
Reviews.Content: I received an iPad but it was not the 64 GB AT&T; WiFi 3G white iPad I paid for. I received a 16GB WiFi ONLY black iPad instead of what I paid $524.99 for. Speedy Mobile never responded to this incorrect item that was shipped. Do not purchase from this seller. They are dishonest and do not respond to customers. Still fighting for a full refund of $524.99 due to incorrect item. Amazon.com denied my original A-Z claim due to their representative incorrectly filing the claim. The Amazon.com representative entered incorrect information and to this day I have not received a refund. Purchase date: 6-17-12. Appeal claim  filed 7-2-12. Today's date: 7-19-12. I purchased this item for a buisness trip, educational and mainly  purposes. Enormous loss. Do the mathematics. Losses per day due to insufficient storage and other specifications. In spite of this extremely disappointing outcome, I'm ooking forward to a happier resolution. Fortunately, still have faith in Amazon.com. Stay tuned for the final update.

Reviews.Title: Admit it, it's better than the first!
Reviews.Author: SnapperL
Reviews.Content: I will admit that the cameras on the iPad 2 are not the greatest but the naysayers have to admit that the iPad 2 is so much faster and thinner than the first generation (to me, that makes it a great update).  I Skyped my parents in Florida for the first time last night (there is no HD version of Skype, so you have to 2X it to fill the screen) and it worked very well.  Last year, I played around with a friends original iPad and decided to be patient and wait for the iPad 2.  So glad I did, the iPad 2 is FAST.  Apps open instantaneously and it is a sleek machine.  I have a hard time putting it down.  I realize that the iPad 3 will probably have some major upgrades but if you have waited for the iPad 2 just get one and enjoy it.  It is the best tablet out there!

Reviews.Title: Brownie Points
Reviews.Author: James G. Clawson
Reviews.Content: Wife sez, no I don't want one for Christmas, don't need an iPhone, an iPod, or an iPad. I said, okay, how about an iRon?  That annoyed her. So, I got her an iPad anyway.  Now she never talks to me, always on her iPad playing Candy Crush. Jeez, I've created a monster!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2: The Best of the Best
Reviews.Author: viridiana
Reviews.Content: If you are currently looking for an amazing product that is very reliable then you are looking at it right now. This Ipad 2 is very easy to use and can be used for almost anything. Whether you are at home and just want to play games or watch Netflix or if you are at school and want to take notes, this Ipad can do just about anything. Many people have consumed and reported their personal experiences and for the most part if you own an Ipad 2 you cooler than everyone else who doesn’t own one. People will look at you at work or in class and envy you since they don’t have one. That is a fact! I encourage everyone to own one of these. It is a purchase I do not regret and I would recommend it to anyone. My whole family owns one from my sister to my cousins and nephews and we are all satisfied with the Ipad 2. It works as a mini computer on the go and you will love it. This item is fun to use and is very appealing. The size and weight of it allows you to be able to take anywhere with you. It is much thinner and it has been created to be much faster than other tablets. You will not have to wait for 10 minutes to allow it to turn on , you will be guaranteed fast service from this apple product. There are also multiple languages from which you can choose from to The display of the Ipad is just phenomenal. It’s glossy widescreen allows you to see everything very nicely. There’s no doubt the resolution quality is the best! You would want to take pictures and videos everywhere you go. This Ipad has also been created with front and rear cameras so you don’t have to only take pictures of others but you can take pictures of yourself. How awesome! So if you and your friend want to take a picture but there is no one around that can do you the favor, there is no need to worry about it because you have this ipad. Adjust the camera to face you and snap away. You can also fix the picture by adding filters or purchasing apps that allow you to fix a picture in anyway whether its adjusting the color and brightness or adding funny stickers or borders. There are thousands of apps you can find that are fun and very useful. Many apps you must pay for but they are usually very cheap and definitely worth it. There are also many free apps that are your usual apps. The app store has thousands of apps specifically for ipads. This allows you to have an enjoyable time when using your ipad. When purchasing your ipad, your item comes with free built in apps. These apps include the camera, calendar, clock, safari and many more general apps you need on a everyday basis. Surfing the web on your Ipad can not get any easier. It was created so that everyone can easily learn from your 4 year old sister to your 70 year old grandmother. The buttons on the exterior of the ipad include the home, volume, and silence key and the hold button. The power and battery life of the ipad is excellent. You can go hours of surfing the web or playing games without having to keep charging it everyday.  For example, I recently went on a trip to San Francisco which took 6 hours. I watched movies on the way there and movies on the way back and didnt have to chrage it during my vacation. It was amazing to be able to use it for so long and not have to keep charging it on my trip. On my trip I was also able to factime my brother who was back at home. With the ipad you can videochat and factime anyone at anytime as long as you have wifi. This allows you to have contact with someone you havent seen for a while. It allows you to be able to see someone while talking to them at the same time. This for me is the best part of the ipad since It clearly allows me to see my brother who lives far away from me. The Apple Ipad 2 is an excellent product overall. If you are still debating whether or not to purchase an Ipad 2 you should go and play with one hands on first before purchasing. You can go to best buy or an Apple store to witness this marvelous item in action.I give the Ipad 2 five stars because I love it. It is very reliable for anything and the design of it makes it easy to use anywhere you go!

Reviews.Title: Great iPad, but not enough memory.
Reviews.Author: GA506
Reviews.Content: Purchased this iPad for my son.  It works very well, screen has beautiful color and resolution.  My biggest complaint (this is more my fault for not researching the product before buying) is that what you buy as far as memory is what you get.  You cannot increase its memory like you can a computer.  We've had to delete video and apps over the past year to make room for more.  My son really hates losing apps from time to time, but we have to if he wants to make room for a new one.  Buy as much memory as you can afford, because after a few months you may find yourself stuck.

Reviews.Title: Review of what I recieved
Reviews.Author: gabby
Reviews.Content: Not only was it late, it had no paperwork there was only one bubble protecting it the others were never aired and the box was crushed so now I need to open it before I gift it, to make sure it isn't broken...Wow

Reviews.Title: not the best
Reviews.Author: Nina Aristo
Reviews.Content: I was very excited when i got this, but as it turns out, something was wrong with the screen and the typing mechanism was weird and not very fast.... almost like the brain of the iPad wasn't working correctly. It was a birthday present for my mom and I ended up having to spend ANOTHER $400 + to buy her a new one because I felt so bad that this one didn't work.

Reviews.Title: Defective and bad quality
Reviews.Author: Young Dong
Reviews.Content: I was expecting apple item pretty much. But this time, this iPad2 really dispointed me. Less than 2 weeks after I bought it. it starts going wrong. Every time I want plug off the charges, it just goes dead. Even if I reinstalled the system, the problem still exists. I dont want it any more, and I'm so angry about it, Caz I lost many important photos and pdfs.What I really hope now is they can refund me as soon as possible!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Save yourself the trouble and get something with android on it!
Reviews.Author: CameraGuy
Reviews.Content: Ended up giving this to my grandpa and getting a nexus 7Don't buy this, you will regret it!!!I went with android and now i am a fan for life, google now works much better than siri!!!

Reviews.Title: Ipad return
Reviews.Author: Marsha Shearer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a Christmas gift, It was not opened until Christmas day. We found that it would not hook up to Wi-Fi.  I contacted the company that it did not function properly. They said that they have a 30 day return policy and would not fix or exchange the iPad. It cost me another 199.00 to have the hard ware repaired. I will never order from this company again. And would not recommend this company to anyone.

Reviews.Title: No wifi
Reviews.Author: JudiK
Reviews.Content: I purchased a "NEW" I pad 2, with verizon wifi. When we tried to connect to wifi, it would not work.we took it to an apple store, they informed us that it was a "refurbished" Ipad.  it even had a barcodesticker on the back with a date on it, the gentleman at the apple store punched in the barcode # and itshowed that the person who had it previously also had problems with the wifi.  He also told us that Ipadsdo not come with barcode stickers on the back.  needless to say we were not happy that we paid $590 for a"NEW" Ipad and recieved a refurbished one.  So check the back of your Ipad, if there is a barcode stickeron the back IT IS NOT a new Ipad, FYI. I will keep you updated when and if we get our refund.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: flip flop
Reviews.Content: Works great!!!! 5 stars all day long!! Definitely a great deal for how much it's worth! Lasts a long time!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ashlie
Reviews.Content: I got the iPad because I needed something smaller and easier to work on. I love it. The shipping could have been better because it took almost a month to get to me but it's great for school.

Reviews.Title: My 6 year old loves his new iPad
Reviews.Author: MOM OF  3 "AISHA"
Reviews.Content: So far my son hasn't had ANY ISSUES with this. It came in factory packaging just like all my other products purchased directly from Apple. Wifi works on his new 16gb+Verizon iPad great. I can't tell you about the Verizon connection yet because I have not connected him to the Verizon network yet. I'll keep you posted. This was purchased through Amazon - sold by The Raisin King but shipped by Amazon. My son's iPad seems to be 100% legit. Now we have 5 total Apple products in my household and they all work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Hard to please electronics person loves this!
Reviews.Author: Bruce F. Lester Jr. "War expert"
Reviews.Content: I thought that this would be another fad item, but I use it all the time.  I bought it to go overseas to use as my internet and ebook reader, but now I use it for everything.  You won't find a better product out there.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need!
Reviews.Author: SecretAsianSam
Reviews.Content: Really does what I need it to do, even though it is the 2nd generation.  64 Gb is really a huge amount, even for an apps hoarder like me.  Screen quality looks very good.  Can't really see much of a difference from a retina display (though I'm sure there is one, it still looks great as is).  Still a bit heavy (which is why they have made an iPad air), but if that doesn't bother you, it is still great.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Allaccess Gift Card "robert cawthon"
Reviews.Content: thank you very much I love this I pad 2 very own one day I buy another I pad 3

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: S. James "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: Arrived within two days, this iPad is in excellent condition.  Followed the sellers instructions for setting it up. This iPad does everything needed.  Excellent service and just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: As advertisement
Reviews.Author: Janina Duncan
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase and came just as advertised! I would order again in the future when I need another IPAD!

Reviews.Title: tthanks
Reviews.Author: Jonny J Duque P "Dukep"
Reviews.Content: all excelent. perfect, thanks, good night and good luck.  the calidad of the operation in rank expected. good bye. jd

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Lorranne M. Wheeler "JustBeYou"
Reviews.Content: Works wonderfully. Mother loves it. Plays with it all the time. Like a kid at Christmas. Great mothers day gift

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: janice stricklin
Reviews.Content: Very nice IPad that we have used for more than a year and it is perfect. I would recommend this seller highly. Good price and is the item as advertised.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2 2nd Gen
Reviews.Author: Christopher Ledesma
Reviews.Content: Got his unit as a gift for my Mother in-law and so far no complains. Unit is working as advertised.  Super Fast Delivery!

Reviews.Title: Old style - take note
Reviews.Author: Heuer
Reviews.Content: the only thing you need to know is that this is a slightly better than the very first model. Still the old style charger and connector. Does not have the retina display, and is being phased out. That being said, I bought this for my 3 year old how plays learning games, so no high expectations.

Reviews.Title: Purchased used from Turbo Tunes - Awesome Deal, Great Seller
Reviews.Author: Gordon Arbesman
Reviews.Content: Arrived 8 days ahead of schedule - absolutely no signs of wear and tear, except the engraving on the back which is mentioned in the description. Almost looks brand new. When turned on the iPad went through the registration process. Once complete it had ~50% battery life and iOS 7.0.3 - updated to iOS 7.1 and looks great. Extremely satisfied customer - Thanks Turbo Tunes! A+

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: deborah fugate
Reviews.Content: Great price and came in as promised on time. Very happy with the price and would recommend this to all my family! Thanks, Grammy

Reviews.Title: I have not liked any iPad covers as much as this
Reviews.Author: PJ Mommy "123"
Reviews.Content: I have not liked any iPad covers as much as this. This IPad looks brand new & works like brand new, my friends can't believe they paid more for the same thing!

Reviews.Title: Glitches
Reviews.Author: Katrina Edwards "trina e"
Reviews.Content: It has a few glitches. At first on the internet I was not able to add the next page. It just started working.  And I don't like the fac that it didn't come with a calculator

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brandy Marvel
Reviews.Content: Works just like it was brand new! No problems at all. The screen have no scratches and look brand new too!

Reviews.Title: New???.....Only the 16 GB could possibly be new
Reviews.Author: Mark Zee
Reviews.Content: The 32 GB and 65 GB iPad 2 have not been manufactured since 2012.  I don't believe these are new.  Most likely customer returns.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Donna G. Smith "Coocoo"
Reviews.Content: Awesome

Reviews.Title: Great iPad
Reviews.Author: MN Mom
Reviews.Content: Great iPad at a great price.  Easy to use with updated functions.  Perfect for the husband and kids.  Wifi connects quickly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value at $100 discount
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 needs no further reviewing, but I greatly appreciated being able to buy it a discount of a hundred bucks from the Apple price.  I came in a new box with all accessories and ready to go.  Being able to buy the Logitech keyboard & cover (refurb) at only $25 made for a total ipad/keyboard/copver package at ~$325 with no shipping and no tax.  All in all, a very good deal from two good suppliers.  Shipping was free and fast on both items.

Reviews.Title: Thinner, faster - more likely to slip from your hands...
Reviews.Author: P. Repage "FT Dad, Doctor & PT photographer"
Reviews.Content: the Apple-era has spawned a whole cottage industry spun off from the fact that the units are thin and slippery and expensive to replace.That being said, if you have an iPad, you need a case too.  :-)

Reviews.Title: Great 2nd generation ipad
Reviews.Author: MummsTheWord
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter...she simply loves it. Music, movies, ebooks, game apps...she does it all.  Bought this generation because of the price. Worked out well.

Reviews.Title: Great deal good product.......
Reviews.Author: Duane Zink
Reviews.Content: This was just as advertised and came in record time!  I am sure we will enjoy this for many years to come!

Reviews.Title: It's real!
Reviews.Author: R. Bethel "r. bethel"
Reviews.Content: Just got this for my Aunt- it's brand new, packaged, sealed, wrapped- perfect!  Could have used bubble wrap due to what was inside the box.  Seller listed as WIFI- but it says Verizon on the screen.  Trying to fix that now- but otherwise listed as promised, not a knock off, real deal. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Has replaced my computer for 90% of my day
Reviews.Author: E. Murnan "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I can not say enough good things about this tablet. I love it and more so the ease at which I can carry it around vs a laptop. Battery life is superb compared to my laptop and the picture is as well.But what really makes this so useful are all the applications you have for it and how easily you can call them up. Want to send an email or check the ones you have waiting. Easy. Want to play a video game Easy. Do you subscribe to a magazine and have a few minutes and you want to read it. Easy. Listen to music. The same. Take a beautiful and I mean beautiful picture and send it to someone quickly. Easy. Children around and you want to make a little video of them. Easy. I could go on and on and on. But the bottom line is EASY. And for what $300 or so. You can't miss.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Anatoly Ritsman
Reviews.Content: Like the product very much , listen to music,go on internet,much convenient than the home computer.like the product a lot.

Reviews.Title: must have
Reviews.Author: cbb88christian
Reviews.Content: Can't beat for the money, and very user friendly. We have tried cheaper tablets and I wish we would have purchased thr iPad first

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Wesley Mc Callum
Reviews.Content: I have a iPad and finally upgraded to the iPad 2, I am impressed,I really  like being able to get some of the newer apts

Reviews.Title: Great service and product. It's what i expected
Reviews.Author: Jason Largent
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the Ipad as stated by seller. A few dents, but everything works on it. I really like the Ipad so far.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Mae Rudd
Reviews.Content: I was excited about my purchase. Didn't get a charger with my iPad but I was satisfied with it. I would purchase something again.

Reviews.Title: Wife is loving it.
Reviews.Author: Elton Hallock
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what we thought it would be and love it.  My wife is loving it very, very much.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: FRISCO
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my Mom and I could not beat the price for a new iPad.  I am very pleased because there is no worry about a fake product or warranty so therefore my Mom can enjoy worry free

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! =)
Reviews.Author: LadyBug
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad 2 - it came on time, VERY MINOR scratches (You would really have to look hard, to realize them), also came with the charger -(Does not come with the original box) but I really got a deal! And to add - the customer service with this seller was good as well. WAY TO GO! My son loves it..

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jiaen li
Reviews.Content: when i bought it the price is really good and valuable. later on the price was increased. I was so lucky.

Reviews.Title: Re:  IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Pat Freeman
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with this I-pad.  It is exactly what I was looking for.and am thankful that I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Locked iPad
Reviews.Author: L. Kelly
Reviews.Content: A great computer but the machine is locked.  Some other wiser iPad users have suspicions about the origin of this 'used' computer.  All I want is directions or help in unlocking.  What I can do on it is very good?

Reviews.Title: It's great in almost every way.
Reviews.Author: Critic
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad with one exception.  The whole thing works very well but they put a very cheap screen on it.  Today I knocked it off a table that is 17 inches high and the screen cracked.  Whatever it's made of is more delicate than glasses that have fallen off the table or other plastic screens on phones that have fallen farther.  I know someone else who had the screen crack.  So, I got a good 2 1/2 months out of it.

Reviews.Title: I Pad II
Reviews.Author: M Eileen Conlin
Reviews.Content: I like it, but there is a learning curve to use it. It came with NO instructions and I needed some.

Reviews.Title: I love my ipad
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. It has been the best thing I have bought in a long time. I am reallying enjoyning my purchase.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Wallers
Reviews.Content: I didn't need the newest tech. IPad 2 works for what I needed to do. I'm very happy with it, although I would have liked to spend. Less on old tech no longer in production. Ah we'll, it's good enough for now.

Reviews.Title: Almost like new!
Reviews.Author: AmazonWoman
Reviews.Content: Ordered this refurbished iPad as a gift for a relative. Was shipped quickly. Not a scratch on it, and works like a charm! Came in original box with everything in package. Very happy with it.  :-)

Reviews.Title: My 1st iPad,love it
Reviews.Author: Amy K. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I'm never on the cutting edge of technology.  But now that I have it, don't know how I lived for so long without it.  Love all the apps.  Only problem is, I can't stop using it.

Reviews.Title: iPad forever!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  Previously I had a kindle fire which I loved also until I tried an iPad my wife brought home from her work...I was hooked.  Graphically it is far superior to the kindle fire in my opinion.  Absolutely love the fact that the calendar, photos, etc...will sync with my iPhone.  The available apps from Apple far exceed anything amazon has to offer.  I'm am a freelance graphic designer and love the amount of helpful design apps available on the apple store.  There is even one that allows me to open a file from my computer and edit designs for customers if I'm away from my desk.  The larger screen size in relation to the kindle fire makes this tablet even more appealing to me.  Don't get me wrong the fire is a good product, but with a kindle app on the iPad to make it a reader for your amazon books...who needs it.  Recommend this product any chance I get.

Reviews.Title: Efficient for its age
Reviews.Author: Trevor Rentschler
Reviews.Content: Able to push iOS 7 with A little lag with minimum stuttering. But this lag is very noticeable. Screen is low res compared to other newer iPads but that is to be expected at this price point. Still runs better then the android competitors.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Rjanew
Reviews.Content: Once I got the iPad wiped clean and got a charger everything was great. It did come with a case, which I didn't  expect so it was a nice surprise. I feel I got a great deal. In fact a colleague ordered one for himself.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: crystal carter
Reviews.Content: A big improvement for my company.  Will increase my business 100%. I am very pleased with merchandise.  Looks great on the stand.

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: Jay B. Greene "jaywriter"
Reviews.Content: After nearly one year it still works great? Wife loves it and uses every day and night. Get one and don't cry.

Reviews.Title: IPAD
Reviews.Author: Tara deeming
Reviews.Content: This IPAD was bought as a replacement for an IPAD that my son accidental broke.  Even though it was an accident, the school made us replace it so I really don't know if it worked and really don't care.  Thanks for having one available.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: Somewhat expensive, but great. No problems yet. My kids and wife enjoy using it all the time. All the application are running well.

Reviews.Title: iPad Rating
Reviews.Author: Teri Charnley
Reviews.Content: We love our iPad!! I am very happy with ordering used products on Amazon!!  I have recommended this option to several people.  The only thing is it seems like the charger cords are very sensitive. Our wires were exposed after the 2nd week.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jeremy R. Clark
Reviews.Content: We have had this iPad for over a year. No issues at all. My wife uses it for real estate daily.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!  Great picture, quality, lightweight.  Perfect for checking e-mails and letting the kids play games on it...I think they use it more than I do.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mansfield Plumbing Company
Reviews.Content: Very Satisfied with the product that choose to purchase, great shipping packaged great will shop again and do recommend that you give this a try. My thanks go out to you sellers that care about your customers. Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Carol Jordan
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet! I had bought other brands, but will never use anything but an Apple again....It works great! Can't picture sitting in front of a computer anymore!

Reviews.Title: perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Nick Stargu
Reviews.Content: I found this product on amazon's website and found it to be perfect for my use. I actually enjoy using this more than my surface or my laptop. It allows me to watch many of my favorite shows on it for free and with the headphone plugged in, it sounds excellent too.

Reviews.Title: The best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Retia M. Hall
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect gift to get into the good graces of your mom, child and love ones and Amazon delivers on time

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Natalie G
Reviews.Content: I just got it in on Saturday, my kids just love it!!  I would too if they let me near it, it was just as described and is in great condition!!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality touch
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: The newer models have a  nicer screen and  the touch keyboard on this model is a little hard to  deal with.  There are some letters that require a harder touch

Reviews.Title: Well my sis Loves it
Reviews.Author: Kaylia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my little sister and she absolutely loves it.Biggest issue which is probably pretty big is the resolution of the camera... No product should carry .92 mega pixels! Really Apple?

Reviews.Title: Out with the old...
Reviews.Author: CaliVEGAN
Reviews.Content: It is really unfortunate that the iPad 2 is being discontinued. I personally love my iPad and couldn't see living without it. Maybe years to come I will update it, but I see no need to rush out and send over $600 on a newer version when mine is just as good. So I bought one for my mom so she could be somewhat up to date with technology lol.Smart buy...

Reviews.Title: Terrible Screen
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: When I received the device it was functional, but that screen was separating from the device and had to be replace.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Lance L. Logan "L Logan"
Reviews.Content: I was recently reminded how cool iPads are when I was forced to work with a bunch of Kindle Fire's.  You can't really compare the two except for maybe form factor.  I'm sure the Kindle must do something better, but I didn't find it.  Sorry Amazon ;)

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 MC774LL/A Tablet

Reviews.Title: Ipad

Reviews.Title: After 2 years
Reviews.Author: sauprankul
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad in October 2011, according to the engraving on the back, and since 2 years seems to be the extent of most gadgets' life these days, I simply had to make a review. A good one, of course.PROS:Weight: By far, the most amazing thing about this tablet is that it weighs so little. I believe it weighs less than any other iPad out there, which is weird, but I think the iPad mini is supposed to cater to those who have a problem with that. The iPad isn't meant to be held in one hand, though. It's a real personal computer, only in tablet from, and you must treat it as such. If you need to be able to read in bed or something, get a kindle or iPad mini. However, you'll find that the iPad is very convenient for most uses.Design: The front of the iPad is defined by a single pane of multitouch glass - and a home button. The back is made of aluminum. There is a front camera, a rear camera in the top right corner, and a speaker at the bottom. This simplistic design, which Apple litigiously fought for against Samsung, is in a word, magical. I'm not too much into the marketing stuff, but seriously, there is something extremely premium about Apple products, and I am sure it is more than the pseudo philosophical marketing. The Smart Cover actually works really well, though its necessity is... debatable. Overall, this tablet feels like its worth 500 dollars. Ok, so it's 400 now, but you know what I mean.Durability: The primary user of this tablet is an unhygienic now-9-year-old who is not exactly dexterous and immediately gets on it after school, sin lavar sus manos. If you know glass, you know that the only thing that can really scratch it are minerals. That's right. Not knives or cleats, though they may if you try hard enough. It's finger salts, salt from food, dust, dirt, sand, jewelry like diamonds and quartz. However, today I wiped off all the prints with a damp hand towel and I could count, I kid you not, 3 micro scratches. That's amazing. This tablet has been dropped, probably not from extreme heights, but still. The glass at the corners, along with the aluminum housing, is tattered. There are several deep scratches in the aluminum on the back. However, there are no functional damages to this tablet. That's also very nice. You probably don't need the Smart Cover for its protective aspect. You will however, want it so you can use it for support. It helps a lot.Display: Eek. I'll kick it to you straight; the resolution of this screen is terrible. If your going to be looking at pictures, you're going to be disappointed. 1024x768 doesn't cut it. My 4.5 inch S2 had a resolution of 800x640. I thought it was sub par, but acceptable. The iPad is just bleh. It's colors are amazing though. I don't know too much about outdoor performance, but I've never felt that brightness was an issue, so it's probably ok. What the iPad lacks in detail more than makes up in size. Laying down in bed with a ten inch screen feels so empowering. I feel like I have all the media in the world in my hands, and I almost do.Apps: I don't use my iPad for work. It stays at home most of the time, and at home, I have my desktop. I would assume it would be pretty easy to use iWork to create, but I wouldn't know. *flame alert* I believe Android is better for smartphones, and iOS for tablets. There is a serious lack of tablet apps for android, but I am continually surprised at the growing iOS tablet app ecosystem. However, there are a greater variety of apps on Android, in my experience. The iPad can actually handle games pretty well, despite its age. That all I really need to say. There isn't any calculator or weather or stocks app, but you'll find great alternatives in the App Store.Camera: Why are you reading this? What are you doing with your life? Why would you want to use the iPad's camera for anything except FaceTime? Seriously? Well, that's all you're going to be able to do, because the cameras on the 2 are terrible. Really. I would expect more for 500 bucks, but whatever. It's not a priority. If you ever find yourself in so dire a situation that you need to use the iPad camera, you better invest in a disposable, or something.Battery life: Ho ho. Tee hee. The battery life of the 2 makes me want to giggle. Even 2 years later, the battery life still feels virtually infinite. I can almost guarantee you, you will never have a problem with the iPads battery life. This is because if the square cube principle. The surface area (screen size) increases at rate of the dimensions, squared. The volume, cubed. More volume means more battery. So, theoretically, the bigger the device, the longer the battery life. Oh, and iOS is super efficient, almost forgot that.Performance: Welp, iOS7 is here. Anybody with anything older than 2012 must upgrade to escape the lag! Not so. Though the animations in iOS7 are super slow and can induce "motion sickness", the iPad 2 handles it pretty well. (I swear, auto correct has something against the word we'll.) The gaming isn't bad for such an old device, though I have yet to try out newer games like asphalt 8. However, you'll be able to stream video (not in hd, of course!) and play 2d games  with no hitches. The keyboard does sometimes take a while to pop up and apps do take somewhat longer to load, but hey, we're talking about an old geezer tablet here.Features: I haven't been able to use Bluetooth to transfer files yet, presumably because Apple wants me to upgrade and use AirDrop. Classic Apple. And I'm pretty sure Siri could easily run on the 2. Oh well, looks like we're stuck with... The two doesn't have any gimmicks, per se, to it. It has the dual cameras, but that's about it. There is nothing to show off. Just to experience. FaceTime is great, though. Like, wow. It's really the best video chat technology I've ever seen. If nothing else, I would commend apple on its FaceTime infrastructure. It's simple and fun and convenient, not to mention powerful.Overall: Even after 2 years of not so nice treatment, my 2 is functionally perfect. It really feels amazing to be able to consume content on such a big screen. The thinness and lightness of the device make it disappear as you're using it. FaceTime really is the best interpersonal video chat platform as of today. IOS 7 runs fine on this, but don't expect to be so lucky next year. I was actually shocked to see the price here on Amazon. Really? 400 bucks for a 2011 tablet? When the 5 is just around the corner and will cost only 100 more? Only a fool would buy it now. However, the 2 really bolstered the image of Apple I had. I have a first gen Nano that actually still works for a whole day! I would expect the iPad to do the same. This review isn't recommending that you buy the 2. All I'm saying is that Apple makes the best tablets out there. Even the most hardcore Android fanatic (which I am dangerously close to) could agree on some levels. iPads are feat for consuming content. Maybe even for creating. However, if you want to get real work done, you're going to want to wait for the next generation of windows 8 pro tablets with Broadwell Chips in them. I need an IDE to be able to do programming when I go to college, and the fact that no such software is available for iOS means that I can't take this there. The iPad isn't a complete replacement for a real computer. But it comes pretty darn close.Sent from my iPad

Reviews.Title: perfect apple product for my 3 year old
Reviews.Author: Mrs Fluffurs ":)"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 3 year old son as an upgrade to his ipad 1. He has been very proficient at using ipad from a very early age. itunes store has a huge selection of learning apps for his age group and younger. My son has been a ipad and ipod user sinc he was about 9 months old, he thinks he is playing, but he is really learning. He is way ahead of where he should be and he has had a ton of fun doing it. After ios 6&7 came out his ipad 1  was no longer able to keep up with the technology of the upgraded apps. I purchased the 64g ipad 2 so he would have plenty of room for his apps since some of the apps can be large downloads. i am able to also to limit what he is able to do in settings and the app store. He can only get apps ifi unlock it. ipad 2 was easy to child lock certain features and content. ipad 2's long battery is great on trips, it keeps him busy and i dont need active wifi for his apps to work. I wish that ipad existed with my other children. I like that he is learning on current to future technology that most daycares or preschools can not provide.  I recommend this to any parent. The ecpense is worth it. A childs education id priceless. ipad 2 is perfect for facilitating that.TJ

Reviews.Content: I bought this model because I just wanted a basic Wi-Fi unit to surf the web from home and retrieve my emails. I didn't need the retina display or the 3g capability.

Reviews.Title: ipads are the best
Reviews.Author: Angela Mitchell
Reviews.Content: i love this item it came quick and packaged very nicely most of my friends have one but i was too scared because i didn't want it to break. i love this ipad

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 received
Reviews.Author: Jody Renfrew
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 was received when it said it would be. I would recommend to everyone. The iPad works great for me.

Reviews.Title: It has grown on us!
Reviews.Author: Eero Turunen
Reviews.Content: My husband got it for work, but we have found so many more uses for it. The one we got looked brand new, if there were any marks on it, we didn't notice them. Although the case was a little on the dirty side, it did come free, so we didn't have to purchase a case separately. Great product and fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory Service
Reviews.Author: Ballubhai
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied for my purchase through Amazon and has no hesitation to give Five Star recommendation. I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: bclin
Reviews.Content: I wanted my son, who has some disabilities, to be able to connect with friends and play games without the hassel of turning on a desktop computer or using my laptop.  This fit the bill!  It was easy for him to use and he is now very interested in FB and communicating through email.  This interest had not happened on our other home computing devices.  This was the perfect fit for him!

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad But A Bad Cord, Sucks I Have To Get A New One
Reviews.Author: Christopher Adams
Reviews.Content: I love my IPad but the cord that came with it doesn't work!!! Sucks I have to buy a new one!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. F. Jones
Reviews.Content: Received this for my birthday and can't tear it out of my husband's hands.  But when I do, I really am enjoying it!!

Reviews.Title: just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Bdawg
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product and works as advertised. I am very glad I purchased this product and would recommend this product to any person looking for a product like this. Amazon continues to provide quality items using a platform that is easy to navigate and use.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Californiamom
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad .  It's not perfect but does everything that I need. I love that it is so easy to get started, about 15 minute setup and I was up and running.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Roxanna
Reviews.Content: Loved this IPad.  It was practically brand new.  No marks or scratches.  It is used every day and it was everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Otherwise perfect.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Pretty sure the power cord was designed to drum up residual income from off the initial purchase, plugging it in takes to much time, seems unreasonably difficult, and the cord too delicate. Now I know why iPad owners I know have had to order new cords. Otherwise, seemingly a perfect little machine.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Californiamom
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad .  It's not perfect but does everything that I need. I love that it is so easy to get started, about 15 minute setup and I was up and running.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Roxanna
Reviews.Content: Loved this IPad.  It was practically brand new.  No marks or scratches.  It is used every day and it was everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Otherwise perfect.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Pretty sure the power cord was designed to drum up residual income from off the initial purchase, plugging it in takes to much time, seems unreasonably difficult, and the cord too delicate. Now I know why iPad owners I know have had to order new cords. Otherwise, seemingly a perfect little machine.

Reviews.Title: C'est tre PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Fanette
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this gadget! I use it for leisure and for school and it helps me out so very much. I have two laptops as well as this iPad and quick frankly, sometimes a laptop is too much sometimes. It's interesting how I've noticed that. Perfect and wonderful overall! I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: John Stone
Reviews.Content: it's good, I bought it to be a gift to my wife, and my wife liked it, she always uses it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hicks
Reviews.Content: I was worried about purchasing used electronic. Great value. My iPad arrived in the exact shape they stated. Better then I expected!

Reviews.Title: Super Switch!
Reviews.Author: winter
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a Windows version of a tablet and it was so horrible It was virtually unusable. So I turned it in for this iPad and I love. It actually works! The only compliant that I think almost everyone has is there is no USB port but its better than a windows device that has a USB port and hardly functions.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jacqui
Reviews.Content: Love the IPad, great price, good shipping and without tax it was cheaper then in the store. Also we used a lot of gift cards we had saved up to buy it!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to set up and use!
Reviews.Author: Susan in Cincinnati
Reviews.Content: I need to learn how to use the notes application and few other things on this but I love how handy it is to use when you're around the house and don't want to run to your computer to look things up online. My phone screen is too small to read most websites but the Ipad is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use. Lots of hard drive space.
Reviews.Author: shelby1069
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for my mother. Easy to use and set up. Using every day and having no problems. She has trouble with electronics but the ipad is working out great!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: William Downer
Reviews.Content: This arrived quickly and in good shape.  Absolutely love all the features and apps.  Use it every day and every night.  Great as a reader too.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert E Lee
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and was very secure and attractive in the outer and inner packaging.  The IPad is one of my favorite tools.  I use it to keep appointments, grocery lists, notes, and more.  I am still discovering more capabilities that are available with the IPad.  I have recommended it to relatives, friends, and anyone that ask me about it.  I don't leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Rita F. Bonneville
Reviews.Content: I got the Ipad 2 for my grandchildren they love playing games on it watching movies & everything. It keeps them happy for hours & hours.

Reviews.Title: Good. Like a new.
Reviews.Author: Championzb
Reviews.Content: Although without headphones and the original power adapter and USB cable line, it is still very good and just like new.

Reviews.Title: Great transaction for me
Reviews.Author: mrjsho
Reviews.Content: This was great for me. The package arrived at my home a day sooner than I expected. The package was in tact with all that I was told I would receive. The IPad itself was in "like new" condition, which is how it was described, with out any defects.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Lacie L
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love our new iPad!  When it first arrived we were concerned that it didn't come with directions.  After turning it on, I soon realized why there is no need.  SUPER EASY TO USE!!  We purchased the iPad because we were taking a trip and thought it would help us navagate around town. It was amazing!  We not only used it for driving directions, but, to help us find great places to eat close by and it was our music as well. I highly recommmend this product!!!  I don't know how we ever got along without it!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Really only a few Knicks and scratches around the edges of the Ipad. Works great, you wouldn't know it was used at all. I love the Smart cover it came with. Even though it was still out of my price range, I don't think I could've found a better deal than this.

Reviews.Title: Wow, use this iPad WAY more than expected
Reviews.Author: Deep Roots
Reviews.Content: The iPad got 5 stars because I use it way more than I thought I would because it is so fun to use. I finally bought the iPad 2 because I'm pilot training and my flight school suggested that students buy one. I went with the older iPad 2 because I figured I would use it for school and not a whole lot more. I use it all the time (more play than school.) I would like to upgrade to a higher screen resolution retina display version soon. Fortunately, my girlfriend is pretty much also in love with this iPad so she's probably going to get an early Christmas present when I upgrade!

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad
Reviews.Author: depleted
Reviews.Content: My first ipad.  Love it. Still not totally familiar with all the ins and outs, but really great addition to our electronics

Reviews.Title: Replaced
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: So I moved a patio table this last summer and failed to move my father-in-laws iPad, which fell off and broke.  Got on my Pad and ordered this one, Amazon was great, it was at his door before he got home from this vacation.  Just like is older model, so good deal.  Next time move the iPad not the coffee cup.  Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Anwamtri
Reviews.Content: This ipad was a great deal. It was cheap and works great. It was just what I wanted. I love it, I love it, I love it. Delivery was fast. I highly recomend this seller.

Reviews.Title: 2 Ipads, 2nd Generation
Reviews.Author: Rena
Reviews.Content: Bought these two Ipads, because my 2 children, needed theirs replaced. They love them, no problems. Glad I purchased them.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Momo "Momo"
Reviews.Content: I got an iPad 2 a while ago. It's a great choice for anyone.It has pretty much the same features as an ipad 3 or 4, except for the fact that the screen in the 3 and 4 are much better (who cares really?) the ipad 2 screen is also beautiful :)The ipad 3 4 have The new charging cable . the iPad 2 doesn't.  i dont see how that makes a difference. also the ipad 3 amd 4 have Siri. But if you don't plan on using Siri alot, the ipad 2 is perfect :Im writing this review on my iPad. :) It's great!

Reviews.Title: Had for over a year
Reviews.Author: Blair Clark
Reviews.Content: And absolutely love it!!! Don't let the cheaper price fool you it's perfect! I use all day everyday :) :)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Molly
Reviews.Content: Our family fights over it!  It is so easy to take along wherever I go.  I can stay in touch with my e-mails and friends since I don't have a fancy phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Marianne Felouzis
Reviews.Content: Thought I'd never need one since I have a laptop, but this thing is by my side constantly!  I thought 16GB might not be enough but there is a ton of space left even with all my apps.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2

Reviews.Content: I love this i havent had no problems with this, has alot of stuff to use, and works Great!Its like if you have a laptop seriously! :) A must have...

Reviews.Title: my son loves this thing

Reviews.Content: best toy. correction, not a toy, a great learning tool, the thing is awesome this thing goes every where with us

Reviews.Content: At first I was skeptical to get this especially refurbished but I'm so loving my iPad right now it like in perfect condition no problems, it only had a oil dent by the charger port but I'm not watching that all together 9/10 for cosmetic everything else 10/10. Even the company I give a 10.

Reviews.Title: Love my new IPAD
Reviews.Author: St. Ben
Reviews.Content: Great product and the apps and uses continue to help me enjoy it more each day.  Again, Great product and found a good deal.

Reviews.Title: awesome!

Reviews.Content: just got it yesterday and despite the fact that it was pre-owned, the ipad was in really good conditions. came with everything as described and set up was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, usefull an good price!
Reviews.Author: GERMADJ
Reviews.Content: Apple is innovation, this device is unique, even this version no 3g but does not matter! it have all inside for entertaiment.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: D.A.
Reviews.Content: This IPad is the best purchase I have made as far as apple products go. Super fast, super smooth, and the apps are great! I don't even use my laptop hardly now because I have my IPad 2! And got it from Target on sale! Excellent graphics too! I love to read my books on here! It's awesome!

Reviews.Content: This is a awesome iPad for $380 works like brand new and looks brand new!I recommend this to everyone looking for a good deal!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT

Reviews.Content: I have been using the IPAD2 for the last couple years and needed a new one.  This refurbished IPAD works just as good as a new one and arrived with no scratches or dents.  I absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: Great piece of technology

Reviews.Content: Really cool piece of technology, was very pleased with purchase, was easy to use and got straight into playing my music and using it to present lectures. I found a great book on how to get started using iPads Using iPad (Computer Training). Well done Apple.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Sherri Hanyo
Reviews.Content: Completely met my expectations!!!!  Best experience yet.  Delivery was on time and the product was in perfect shape.  My son is on it everyday.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE!
Reviews.Author: AM/PM For Less
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the first generation iPad because it started to run slowly...  I guess that's what you get when you order refurbished...  However, I didn't want to spend the money on the brand new generation iPad, but I still wanted one that would run fast enough and still had the camera. I absolutely LOVE my iPad.  I have taken it on every trip because it is the perfect size to fit into your purse. :)

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad, Better than 5
Reviews.Author: electronic fan
Reviews.Content: This iPad is fantastic! But the battery life is not as good as I expected. Just playing a game for ten minutes runs the battery life down 5%, but it does take less time to charge than the one with retina display.I know a person who has the ipad wth rd, and I don't see much diff. between the A-5 and the  A-6 chip. but the battery gets really hot on the one with rd. I would not spend 150 extra dollars for tretina disply, A-6 chip, and longer battery life, and siri, when this is really good. I love my ipad 2.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Linda Ransley
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband. He is more than thrilled. I think the description said minor scratches on back and you could barely see them. Took 2wks in shipping though. Everything works great. Great product. Really good price.

Reviews.Title: not the latest but...
Reviews.Author: Paul Thompson
Reviews.Content: it does what it does. it is not the latest of units, but it is well designed. geat for reading text. I use it for reading music & writing notes.

Reviews.Title: Favorite product in the world!
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Wow I debated on an iPad for so long! I had a really small laptop but I always dreamed of an iPad. I finally took the plunge and would never give it back. Yes, it is pricy but is so worth it!! I mainly use mine for Facebook, shopping, Internet banking, and playing candy crush. It is a great convenience to just turn it on and start using. No worrying about loading or starting up. The picture is hd and crystal clear. If you need a keyboard they make Bluetooth ones. I would buy a newer one but mine is still going great !

Reviews.Title: Stupid Requirements for reviews!
Reviews.Author: Richard C "Richard"
Reviews.Content: Good product. Wish it were a little cheaper and didn't have a few aviation bugs. this is dumb, so here are the extra words to get me out of this.

Reviews.Title: Love it still learning to use
Reviews.Author: carol b.
Reviews.Content: this is my first ipad but I love the light weight easy to use and the charge lasts. I am not an all day web person but I have been using it more with the ipad

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Barney
Reviews.Content: Great product and service.  I have enjoyed my iPad in so many ways, it is wonderful to have a computer so light weight.

Reviews.Title: The best one!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mgnole Laudvil
Reviews.Content: I love it, thank you Amazon for this expensive IPad for that low price!!!!!! I brought it used, and it doesn't have any problems whatsoever, no fixing, works properly, it's 100% securely positive, love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: All I expected it to be

Reviews.Content: Great price, speedy delivery and I can run games like KOTOR on it smoothly and beautifully. One of my favorite features though is the origami style slide show of all your pictures so it can be displayed when not in use as a picture frame.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: ldenn
Reviews.Content: It has worked perfectly.  It has done all that I have asked of it. Great bargain for the price.  I  would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: YES!
Reviews.Author: Deborah HERRERA
Reviews.Content: This Ipad is great.  It is what I needed, works great, and the price was just right.  It arrived within three days of purchase and I have been having a great using for relaxing and work. I recommend this seller to all!

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: Marv
Reviews.Content: Was a little skeptical, but purchased because of the good price and the vendor seemed to honor his return policy. I was not disappointed. My daughter loves it. It arrived very fast and it has no defects or flaws.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 MC986LL/A Tablet
Reviews.Author: Abdullah Alothman
Reviews.Content: I just love my ipad 2 - with all of the cool apps and music - nice!!! Easy to use and portable

Reviews.Title: great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Sechler "K Sechler"
Reviews.Content: It's just what I wanted and is working fine! I use it in my classroom for my special needs students and also at home for myself and my grandsons.

Reviews.Title: We get this tablet last year but...still works great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Pena Garcia
Reviews.Content: This was a present for Christmas and I was a little afraid of buying for another person, but the product is still working great and we just loved it. Great price and good product.Thanks,Onex

Reviews.Title: Great as always! A+++
Reviews.Author: Gerardo V.
Reviews.Content: I have already purchased 4 ipads from this seller for my family. Love them. Lol I jailbroke all of them and set them up so all pictures, apps, games, and media are shared. Set up a network had drive and now everyone has over 50,000 songs, 2,000 movies, and thousands of cartoons to watch! Awsome if I may say so myself

Reviews.Title: Very fast...
Reviews.Author: George L. Danielewski
Reviews.Content: Very good little computer but the battery life is not to long...  Also manual would help and cut down on guess work...George D. Langhorne , PA

Reviews.Title: excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The ipad came quickly, in great shape (only some small dents on the back) and works perfectly. If it wasn't for the dents, you would have been hard pressed to tell it was used. Good company to buy from and I recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an ipad 2. After comparing features and battery life this model suited me best. Finding a good price on a brand new in the box took awhile but finally I found this one and I am enjoying using this ipad 2 for 3 to 4 days without having to recharge it.

Reviews.Title: great screen quality
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I would not call it light years ahead of their prior version but it is still a nice unit.the screen quality and the picture quality is astounding.It has the usual ease of usability that we have come to love and apple has set the new standard in reliability.  HP can learn a lot from apple.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Louise Rittmiller "Louise MSN RN"
Reviews.Content: Love it love it love it love it. It takes great pictures and I can stay connected to the Internet wherever there is WiFi.

Reviews.Title: IPAD for Elderly Mom
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lane
Reviews.Content: I bought this Ipad for my mom who is 88 years old.  It is fab and she loves it for her email, since she can sit in her comfortable chair and check her email and write short notes back.

Reviews.Title: Good Seller to deal With
Reviews.Author: Carl Stough "Retired"
Reviews.Content: I returned this Item and got a refund! My wife had bought one to so I had to return! Sorry for the one star!!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G)
Reviews.Author: Dr. Daniel Brewer
Reviews.Content: I have been an owner of an Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G) since the date of it's first released in the US on March 11, 2011. After more than two years of heavy use both personally and professionally I can say the Apple iPad changed my life. It is without a doubt one of the most innovative, useful, and powerful products on the market. That was true in April of 2010 when Apple released the first iPad, and it remains true to this day. An unimaginable number of iPad reviews exist online, so I will not restate the specs or the seemingly endless uses and applications. I will simply state that I have never regretted my purchase of my iPad for one second and I have found it to be one of the most versatile, useful, and simple pieces of technology I have ever owned. It's multipurpose functionality cannot be overstated. I cannot speak highly enough of the Apple iPad - and look forward to the day when I can upgrade to the latest model. Even so, my iPad 2 continues to be fully functional, fast, and sturdy. Why wait - BUY APPLE!

Reviews.Title: The product was literally new
Reviews.Author: dario
Reviews.Content: I bought several things on the web, things that were considered "NEW" and actually they weren't.This time everything changed, the product was literally new, no use at all and I saved a lot of money.I've been a long term Apple customer and will be forever.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Sherrie
Reviews.Content: Apple iPad 2 MC979LL/A Tablet (16GB, Wifi, White) 2nd Generation...In perfect condition with a screen protector....that was a surprice :)Love it love it love it.  Great price!

Reviews.Title: typical apple product
Reviews.Author: Mike Harte
Reviews.Content: apple wants to lync all your apple devices. instead they should concentrate on the ipad being setup as a stand alone device. Had to have customer support just to set it up.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Becky Buckler
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace one that only had Wifi.  Now I am able to access the information I need even in places where Wifi is not available.  If I can use my cell phone, I can use my iPad!

Reviews.Title: tootie
Reviews.Author: tootie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the person who received it was very happy.  She has used it now for two months and no problem with the product. Yes I would recommend this company in the future.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Morse "cynmor"
Reviews.Content: It's been a real time saver and occupier for my child. Thank you for the smooth machine. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: chris stern
Reviews.Content: Terrific buy; I love this iPad! Nasty scratch on screen but I can live with it.....so happy to finally own an iPad...thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just "meh".
Reviews.Author: Jessie Ivey
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have gotten a newer model. I pretty much have given up on this thing, so many apps that I would like to have don't work because it's outdated. I love the iPad in general and still plan to keep it for a while, but it's functionality leaves a lot to be desired. The NPR app works perfectly which is really great, and I mostly just use it for portfolio purposes and if I don't feel like carrying around a bulky laptop. Please listen to folks who tell you that this is not a replacement for a laptop, they are not lying. Seriously. Don't get rid of your damn laptop.

Reviews.Title: amazing for the price...
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: i just bought this ipad 2 on the may 19th  and i got on the 22nd i recieved it fast and i am very pleased with this it and it is a 32 gb and the price was 314.00 that was a great price and i got it just in time because i got the last one but i only paid 300.00 because of the money i had saved on my account and bought some cases and other items with the money on my account it said used but it only had 3 marks on it 1 on the screen and 2 on the back it was like new to me just for 3 marks thats nothing and coming from a andorid tablet to an ipad it feels amazing and i love it... once again i paid 300.00  but the price was 314.00 for a ipad 2 32gb used.  AMAZING AND WONDERFUL....

Reviews.Title: Used iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Nixon Peter
Reviews.Content: The item was shipped faster than I thought and is in good condition. It came with the charger and cable as described but with scratches on the back which were pretty intense. Though if it's in the iPad cover  it can't be noticed coz the screen is in perfect condition. All in all the item was and still is good!

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Patricia M Marshall
Reviews.Content: GOOD QUALITY, EXACTLY WHAT WAS ADVERTISED.  WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO FRIENDS.  I REALLY LIKE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE PRODUCT AS WELL.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: forevablessed13
Reviews.Content: Heard of all the iPads that were made this was the best generation of them all, I even saw the drop test & the battery test on YouTube, over all this was a better purchase. And I'm still enjoying it till now!!!

Reviews.Title: IPad-2
Reviews.Author: Patrick M.
Reviews.Content: This was a Mother's Day gift for my wife.  I ordered it on Friday and it came on Saturday, just in time for Mother's Day.  Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: enough said
Reviews.Author: Nefertiti
Reviews.Content: it came as expected brand new and was really nice. I still enjoy it and never got tired of using it.

Reviews.Title: The ipad is small and compact for taking it with you!
Reviews.Author: sheila scott
Reviews.Content: I find it easy to use and especially like emailing with it. I use it every day and love how organized it keeps me.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I also would like to consider a mini ipad.This product is great. Thinking also to get one as a gift but looking for another price value.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT iPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished iPad 2 (32 GB, Wifi+AT&T; 3G for my husband's birthday because he won't leave mine alone. Mine is also a refurb but I I bought it at Apple online and spent about $700.00 for it compared to Rocket Jakes price of $399. A Genius at Apple told me he prefers refurbished products as any FACTORY quirks that existed are straightened out. The iPad was simple to set up. It was in original Apple packaging and works perfectly. The AT&T; Wi-fi was also easy to set up. AT&T; has lower data charges for iPads than Verizon but Verizon has a larger coverage area. Alas! Money is tight. I also got a Smart Magnetic Cover for Apple Ipad 2 cover at Amazon from CyprusTech for $7.74 compared to the $39 I spent for mine at Apple and it looks and acts exactly the same. I'm thrilled with this product so far but I set it up with my Apple ID and now I'm going to have to jump through some hoops to figure out how to get my husband his own Apple ID because iTunes is all set up on one computer with MY Apple ID ....h-h-m-m-m! Another tech challenge.

Reviews.Title: Omg I love it
Reviews.Author: Tia LaFlesh
Reviews.Content: We travel and have medical appointments all over two states and  this has allowed my to take my college class with me while staying in touch with my family while we r away

Reviews.Title: I love it..
Reviews.Author: Stan Kent
Reviews.Content: Best thing I could have bought for myself.  I use it for so much.  Speakers could be betters and louder.  Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who does not want to lug a laptop around everywhere.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable product
Reviews.Author: Fenderman27
Reviews.Content: apple has done it again. the ipad is an absolutely incredible learning tool and makes it easy to have a computer anywhere you go

Reviews.Title: Perfect quality & price. Fits iPad 2/3/4
Reviews.Author: Zeljko Delic
Reviews.Content: I own 4 different models and I’m very satisfied with everything: quality, design, features and price! I would like to recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: g
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: this ipad works great, a bit battered from their corners and difficulties with charger ... the sent with a charger who did not work .... but otherwise'm happy ...

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Works great! Have had no issues! Got it at a great price! Everything worked great right outa the box. I'm glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Alex Argitis
Reviews.Content: this product has filled all my expectations as it meets what I need for that reason I understand that the purchase was successful

Reviews.Title: baby love it

Reviews.Content: She enjoying everyday of her life with this thing I can't get her off it she sleep with it all day every day and night

Reviews.Title: Can't live without
Reviews.Author: Dakota Blue
Reviews.Content: This was my second iPad 2. After the first was stolen, I realized I couldn't live without it. I mostly use it for nursing school, but also like to stream videos and play some games on it. The only downfall I've found to buying an iPad over other tablets, is that it doesn't work with Microsoft Office. You have to purchase an expensive app to be able to work with those types of documents.

Reviews.Title: My best electronic purchase.
Reviews.Author: Just me
Reviews.Content: I was given an older version IPAD from my brother last year and really liked it but it only worked on Wi-Fi. I don't live in an area where Wi-Fi is always available so I was limited to using it at home. so a few months later when my 50th birthday was coming up, my husband asked what I would like. I told him the only thing I wanted was the IPad with wireless AND 3G. Of course he thought I was nuts since I had a perfectly good, working IPAd already. So naturally, I got my wish!  We ordered a refurbished one to save money. I have not been disappointed yet! I take it everywhere with me. I am impressed with the speed even when using 3G. I am able to use it at our cabin and streamed our High School basketball State Championship game with zero problems.  The only problem I have now is I own a 5 month old Laptop that I rarely use!

Reviews.Title: Not a computer Works well but over priced
Reviews.Author: Alex Paradis
Reviews.Content: I like the screen great to watch football games and movies on.  I didn't buy my iPad but i know it was expensive $1,000! It has flaws its not a full fledged computer no usb and no typing applications so not for some how is in the market for a computer

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2 - Everything I hoped it would be
Reviews.Author: Cathie
Reviews.Content: This item came in its original box and looked brand new.  Was very pleased with my purchase.  Recommend this Apple IPad.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 64 GB

Reviews.Content: I bought an Ipad64 GB 2nd generation,it is in a very good condition as it was described. thank you so much

Reviews.Title: great Ipad

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Title: What to say that hasn't been said
Reviews.Author: Jahmez "I'm a nerd who wants to help"
Reviews.Content: Chances are, you know what an iPad is and know the positives of it. It is very user friendly, it has tons of apps, and they are all ran through Apple so they work very well. There are occasional crashes with streaming app, but it only closes the app and you can reopen it. This is the iPad 2, so, if you are expecting Siri... you will be disappointed. Siri is nice, but it isn't needed to love this product. The maps is still awful, but you can get Google maps and that is much better. Realistically, this is wonderful for people who do a lot of internet based surfing and want a phone experience but bigger. It is also great for family that is horrible with tech. If you are wondering, "Well, I'm a power user, is there anything for me?" Firstly, you should know how to look that up yourself. Secondly, yes! You can VPN into a laptop or desktop with many apps available in the app store to Virtualize your desktop from any wifi access point. Great buy and if money is a problem, the iPad 2 is now cheap enough to not be a big purchase.

Reviews.Title: drizzlerific
Reviews.Author: Jewellester D. Carney
Reviews.Content: it's fun to have for play and I can for school use it for school, to save my homework on.

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Title: Always great but Ipad 2 should get some upgrades by now

Reviews.Content: I bought IPad 2 as a gift for my wife.  We have 1st gen IPad that we got when Ipad came out first time.  Still works good with some lagging now days but it works good.  IPad 2 works pretty good but I just think there are so many better one out there now days with a lot cheaper price.  I love apple products but tablets pricing has gone down so much that IPad is just getting too expensive.  There are 10 inch tablet from Google Nexus 10 with better spec than latest Ipad and it's cheaper than Ipad 2 that I bought.  I see so many other companies such as Idolian with their Studio 10 that works better than IPad 2 and cost only $250.  Ii think Apple is great product but I think they need to get in the game with more reasonable price.  BTW, I'm returning this iPad and getting Studio 10 or Nexus 10.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Handy
Reviews.Author: D. Oppenheim
Reviews.Content: I really like this iPad. I just couldn't give it 5 stars because the display looks alot less sharp than my iPhone 4S. I know this does not have the retina display, which is why, but it just still irritates me a bit when I use it. If I knew the new iPad would have been out soon, I would have held out on buying this until the new iPad with the retina display was out. Anyway, this iPad is still useful. I use it mostly for reading/writing emails and surfing the web while sitting on the couch. Sometimes I use Facetime which works well since my Wifi connection is fast. This thing runs smoothly and is pretty fast. The games for iPad are pretty fun to play on thing as well. Also, I find the camera is not all that great indoors and most of my indoor photos look grainy. Overall a good product but not the sharpest screen.

I have played with many of the other computer pads like the Samsung but I think the Apple Ipad beats them all hands down. If it was not so expensive I would have purchased at least two more, but the price keeps me from doing that.  I rate this device with an A+

Reviews.Title: nice

Reviews.Title: bomb

Reviews.Content: love it. not close to filling i after the 1st quarter of nursing school.i think silly to need so many words for a review):

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Bex
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our purchase. We had one very happy boy on Christmas!! We couldn't be happier! Thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Envy
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product for everyone. The controls are simple enough for even my parents to understand (lol, I love them, but they're a little slow on the technological uptake), but the functions it provides and the apps that can be added are able to provide complex operations tailored to suit any need.The battery life is amazing. I can use it almost continuously for approximately twenty hours before I need to reuse it. Less if I'm using heavy graphics, etc. But even then it functions for around sixteen hours. It charges very quickly when turned off and plugged into the wall. The screen is very responsive, and the keyboard is not as difficult to use as I had feared (this is referring to the larger keyboard that appears when you turn the device side-ways. The smaller keyboard is more difficult, but not impossible). The only downside I see to the keyboard is that I can't select Spanish letters and accents. I hear that there may be a way to get them, but I haven't had success thus far.All in all, a wonderful device. I love it, and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 64GB
Reviews.Author: Michele Carter
Reviews.Content: The iPad overall is very nice. It runs smoothly and having the extra storage space is great. The only negative thing I have to say is that the screen is not the best compared to the retina display on the newer iPads and iPhones, but that is perfectly fine because of the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: Stephen Streett
Reviews.Content: Much faster than I expected and easy to use. My daughter thinks it the best  present she has ever received!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
